website_summaries.verdict: Beauty blending sponges that offer many of the same design features as the competition but at a fraction of the price.
pros: Pack includes 2 high-quality sponges that can be used wet or dry
Features a rounded side, flat side, and pointed tip for makeup application all over the face
Latex-free so they’re safe for people with allergies
cons: Texture can be a little rough
Some users find that they can flake after several washes

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars!
customer_reviews.text: This is really nice: it inflates nicely with water and put on my Clinique CC creme flawlessly and without streaks. I am allergic to latex and did not get hives or a rash, so it is definately latex free. The sponge is soft, easy to clean, and works well. Also, you get two of them so that is a bonus.
customer_reviews.author: Amazingly Attractive

customer_reviews.title: really good to use!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for replacement makeup sponges and I am already fall in love with these!! They are super soft and easily get big after absorbing water! The reason why I like these makeup sponges so much is that the makeup won't stick to the sponge like other ones I've used before. So I would say I am absoluteky satisfied with the quality. Great buy and I will keep purchasing.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Yu

customer_reviews.title: LOVE THESE
customer_reviews.text: I love these for liquid foundation. Perfect. I can't even say exactly what it is that is so great about them in particular-they just allow the makeup to go on smoothly and they are the right squishy/firm ratio. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Becky

customer_reviews.title: Really like it
customer_reviews.text: It is soft with no bad smell like some of the others I've tried. Expands when dipped in water. I would recommend wetting it in water, squeezing the water out and applying foundation with the damp sponge.
customer_reviews.author: Jeannie84

customer_reviews.title: These are better than original beauty blender!
customer_reviews.text: I love these beauty sponges as they are really soft and bouncy. They did a great job of applying facial foundation and loose powder. They are comparable to the original beauty blender in term of quality. However, they are much better in term of price and how big they are.
customer_reviews.author: Yui Thongcharoen

customer_reviews.text: I am not usually one to write any reviews at all, but I felt like I needed to warn people of this product. At first, the sponge was great but after a few uses the sponge began to flake as I was using it. Black specks mixed with my foundation and stuck to my face. Super disappointed :(.
customer_reviews.author: Shelby Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: My very first makeup sponge. I’m really happy that l bought it. I love the texture and shape that ensures impeccable, streak-free application with minimum product waste. I’ll definitely keep buying this product in the future.
customer_reviews.author: CX

customer_reviews.title: Good sponges
customer_reviews.text: I like these sponges. They do what I want them to do. I use them daily.
customer_reviews.author: Mary526

customer_reviews.title: Nice product
customer_reviews.text: Feels good, nice texture! I think something happened with shipment system, but arrived as it expected be patient about tracking info. Good experience.
customer_reviews.author: Tony

customer_reviews.title: excellent
customer_reviews.text: Work well for beginners like me. These blender sponges are in perfect size. So good to use on cheeks, forehead and chin.
customer_reviews.author: Ricky

customer_reviews.title: Great price for you everyday beauty blender
customer_reviews.text: Feels like beauty blender but obviously for a cheaper price! I prefer it soaked in water before using so it’s softer & doesn’t obsorb too much of my foundation but if you want better coverage def go without soaking.
customer_reviews.author: Zhoumin Li

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Great makeup sponge. It makes my foundation more smooth and get better coverage. Very soft when it absorbing in water. Love it sooooooo much!!
customer_reviews.author: wucaibanlan_0229

customer_reviews.title: I am surprised that this thing is so good.
customer_reviews.text: I was recommended by one of my friends to try this beauty blender out. Turns out my friend is right. It is really soft and does not cause any irritation to my face. I do think that a makeup sponge is better than a makeup brush. Easy to use and can cover every little spot. Well, I think I will stick with this nice one in the future.
customer_reviews.author: cui ye

customer_reviews.title: Good quality and good for makeup
customer_reviews.text: This is the third time I buying makeup sponge, and this one the best among all of them. This sponge is very soft and bouncy, so it is good to be used when applying foundation!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Tried one of them and it’s definitely better than real technique ones that I always use. Will come back and purchase again. :)
customer_reviews.author: chenguo

customer_reviews.title: Nice bouncy beauty sponge
customer_reviews.text: After running it in der water, it becomes soft and is nice and bouncy when applying foundation. Great price for what I paid for!!
customer_reviews.author: abcvvn

customer_reviews.title: Great product! I will buy it again.
customer_reviews.text: Great makeup sponge. It makes my foundation more smooth and get better coverage. Very soft when it absorbing in water. I just love the shape which makes more angles for different areas. I will recommend it to my friends.
customer_reviews.author: Wei

customer_reviews.title: Love these products
customer_reviews.text: Love this makeup sponge. This softer sponge that's easier on the face and blends my make up the best out of the other sponges I've tried.
customer_reviews.author: Y

customer_reviews.title: recommend it
customer_reviews.text: So soft to blend foundation. It becomes larger when absorbing water. Very good quality product. I strongly recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: LIU YI

customer_reviews.title: Soft and can't wait to use
customer_reviews.text: Really nice sponge and affordable price. I like the light color.
customer_reviews.author: Qian Kang

customer_reviews.title: AMAZING SPONGES
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING! these are really soft and squishy, especially when they’re wet, i will be repurchasing in the future!
customer_reviews.author: Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good product.. quick delivery!
customer_reviews.text: 5-star for this reasonably priced, good quality product. With Amazon Prime, very quick delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Blends beautifully
customer_reviews.text: Works as intended. I'm not a professional makeup artist but it works fine with me.
customer_reviews.author: Kiki

customer_reviews.title: Good value
customer_reviews.text: Easy to clean and use. Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: Good!
customer_reviews.text: They are good. I'm satisfied with the quality as they work for my purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Recommend
customer_reviews.text: Great makeup sponge. It makes my makeup looks nature! It’s worth the price anyway. Recommend BTW :))
customer_reviews.author: dannnni

customer_reviews.title: Soft and good to use wet
customer_reviews.text: Great product with good quality. Sponge is soft and it’s good to use with water!
customer_reviews.author: Qin

customer_reviews.title: Washes easy, good product
customer_reviews.text: Nice product. Remember to wash daily and let one dry and use other- or buy soft natural sponge. Soft and cleans easy
customer_reviews.author: Bradley

customer_reviews.title: Practical sponge
customer_reviews.text: This sponge retains its shape well and spreads foundation evenly.
customer_reviews.author: Gail T. Murdock

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous! It grows big after I wet it. Come with 2 packs. So I would say really WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.author: Jianguo Yuan

customer_reviews.title: RT Dupe!!
customer_reviews.text: These are good makeup sponges. A true dupe for Real Technique sponges which I used to use all the time.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Vang

customer_reviews.title: Great Beauty Sponge!
customer_reviews.text: It is really a good deal on these beauty sponge!! Package came in great condition with 2 packs. Work well for full coverage on my face. Would recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: HOPEMATE Makeup Sponge, Pack of 2, Latex-Free Beauty Sponge Blender for Foundations, Powders & Creams, Flawless Coverage of Comestics (apricot)
feature_bullets: 3 in 1 Functions: The rounded side of our beauty sponge can be used for large areas like cheeks, forehead and chin. The flat edge can be used for fitting the contours of the face. And the pointed top can be used for nose, eyes, mouth and any other hard-to-reach spots.
Latex-free Cosmetic Sponge: It is safe to use for snesitive skin. Non-allergenic, odor free and eco-friendly.
Wide application: Our beauty sponge effectively applies a range of cosmetics — from foundation liquids to pressed powders — as easy as ABC.

2 Usages: Wet the applicator sponge when you want to apply foundations.After fully saturated, wring out the excess water and use. People with blemishes or shininess may prefer to use a dry sponge for a flawless finish.
Easy to use: The soft and bouncy makeup sponge is ergonomic and easy to use. Even a greenhand makeup artist can handle her/his makeup application amazingly.
